levels.description: After deployment, summons a rare Vanillawing: the rare Vanillawing can sow tiles; sowed tiles give allied units +40 ASPD; <Monoliths>, <Strange Ore Veins> and Machine enemies take 40% more damage from allies on sowed tiles; the rare Vanillawing can periodically give allied Operators on the field -30% Redeployment Time the next time they leave the field
